attributes.action: decrease the blatant propoganda and encourage even handed,open debate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is primarily to do with global warming,although it can be equally levelled at 
a vast range of issues.
The problem is that we are given obviously biased,therefore unfair reports backed up by "researched"facts and figures.
 with sometimes only a token opposite view offered it is really no surprise how swiftly these "hot"issues can take off and become the stick with which to browbeat people into not necessarily well thought out measured responses.
 In order that we may be allowed to make proper,informed and calculated judgements on what are without doubt serious topics,we need to be in possession of the truth,not a heavy-handed,uneven opinion of a"suit" with letters after his name.
 We,the British people,deserve better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
